name: AHA/BHA Clarifying Treatment Toner
description: The formulation of AHA+BHA+Purifying Botanical ingredients help to improve skin texture, increase vitality, and control pores. Eliminate impurities, exfoliate, and hydrate all in one step.
KeyIngredient: Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Water + Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Water,Glycolic Acid,Betaine Salicylate
